organization.description:
Legal Services of Greater Miami, Inc. (LSGM) provides free legal advice, referral, and representation in the areas of public and subsidized housing, homeownership issues (including mortgage foreclosure), public benefits (food stamps, cash assistance, Medicaid and Social Security disability), reemployment assistance, federal income tax, special education issues, and community economic development.

Also offers special projects to help the homeless, children, veterans and people with AIDS. LSGMI also provides a variety of Community Legal Education seminars and hosts two u0022pro seu0022 clinics: one to assist individuals filing in small claims court and the other to assist individuals who qualify for simple divorces.

###MON###
organization.name: LEGAL SERVICES OF GREATER MIAMI, INC.
